headline: Court-Ordered Religious Liberty Training Reversed In Win For Employer
summary: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit recently reversed a district court judge's order requiring religious liberty training for three in-house lawyers at Southwest Airlines. The judge...
